# My Static Site - a Python-based static site generator's demo website

This site contains structured content formatted for LLM-friendly consumption.

## Posts
- [Customizing Stattic: Command-Line Arguments for Stattic](https://example.com/blog/command-line-arguments-for-stattic/): ID 7583285476
- [Decentralizing Publishing with Stattic](https://example.com/blog/decentralizing-publishing-with-stattic/): ID 3085796601
- [How to Build and Deploy Your Website with Stattic and GitHub Pages](https://example.com/blog/build-with-stattic-and-deploy-on-github-pages/): ID 5126177405
- [Customizing Stattic: Front Matter Fields](https://example.com/blog/front-matter-fields-for-stattic/): ID 2816102747
- [Say Hello to Stattic](https://example.com/blog/say-hello-to-stattic/): ID 4385250979
